Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer

Class SaveScoreImageLoader

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer.SaveScoreImageLoader
public class SaveScoreImageLoader extends Object
The helper of the SaveScoreController to facilitate the rendering process of the save score page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916

  • Method Details

    • renderGameFinishPageBackground

      public static void renderGameFinishPageBackground​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView background, javafx.scene.image.ImageView page, int type)
      Render the background according to the status of the game
      Parameters:
      background - the background to be rendered
      page - the different outcome of the game finish page like You Lose!, You Win!, Level Passed!
      type - the int value when 0 represents gameover; 1 represents level passed; 2 represents victory

    • renderGameFinishPageButton

      public static void renderGameFinishPageButton​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView back_button, javafx.scene.image.ImageView next_level, boolean focus_back, boolean focus_next)
      Render of the the buttons in the game finish scene
      Parameters:
      back_button - the ImageView type of button of "back to main" button
      next_level - the ImageView type of button of "next level" button
      focus_back - a Boolean type that indicates whether the back button is focused by the user
      focus_next - a Boolean type that indicates whether the continue button is focused by the user

    • renderGameSavePage

      public static void renderGameSavePage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView background, javafx.scene.image.ImageView foreground)
      Render the game save page background according to the choice of the background image of the user
      Parameters:
      background - the background to be rendered
      foreground - the image placeholder for the game save page

    • renderGameSavePageButton

      public static void renderGameSavePageButton​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView back_button, boolean focus_back)
      Render the game save page button
      Parameters:
      back_button - back_button ImageView placeholder is used to load images and serve as a back button of the page
      focus_back - If the user is focusing on the back button
